Search your library for an instant or sorcery card not named Spectacular Illusions, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If Spectacular Illusions was cast for its memorial cost, put it into your graveyard instead.
Memorial {B} [i](Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)[/i]
